commits: 19749f1: fix(#190): prevent deleted repositories from reappearing after Sync All
message: TDD implementation complete. All 59 tests pass. ESLint 0 errors, TypeScript 0 errors. Implemented repository exclusion via existing enabled column in repositories table. DELETE API now calls disableRepository() before worktreeIds check. Sync API filters excluded repos. New excluded/restore APIs added. UI updated with exclusion list and restore functionality.
